SELECT a.* , ROUND((a.totalProfit - IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit))/a.totalProfit * 100,2) totalProfitGrowRate , ROUND((a.mainBusinessProfit - IFNULL(b.mainBusinessProfit,a.mainBusinessProfit))/a.mainBusinessProfit * 100,2) mainBusinessProfitRate , CASE WHEN a.totalProfit - IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit) > 0 THEN 1 WHEN a.totalProfit - IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN a.totalProfit - IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit) < 0 THEN -1 ELSE 0 END AS isGrow, CASE WHEN a.finalProfit - IFNULL(b.finalProfit,a.finalProfit) > 0 THEN 1 WHEN a.finalProfit - IFNULL(b.finalProfit,a.finalProfit) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN a.finalProfit - IFNULL(b.finalProfit,a.finalProfit) < 0 THEN -1 ELSE 0 END AS isBelong , CASE WHEN (a.totalProfit - a.operateProfit - a.finalProfit) - (IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit) - IFNULL(b.operateProfit,a.operateProfit) -IFNULL(b.finalProfit,a.finalProfit)) < 0 THEN 1 WHEN (a.totalProfit - a.operateProfit - a.finalProfit) - (IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit) - IFNULL(b.operateProfit,a.operateProfit) -IFNULL(b.finalProfit,a.finalProfit)) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN (a.totalProfit - a.operateProfit - a.finalProfit) - (IFNULL(b.totalProfit,a.totalProfit) - IFNULL(b.operateProfit,a.operateProfit) -IFNULL(b.finalProfit,a.finalProfit)) > 0 THEN -1 ELSE 0 END AS belongOther FROM( SELECT LEFT(p.publish_day,4) publishYear , ROUND( SUM( ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) + ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit) ) / 100000000,2) totalProfit, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2))/100000000,2) mainBusinessProfit, ROUND((SUM(ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2)) - (SUM(ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2)))) / 100000000,2) viceBusinessProfit, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit)) /100000000,2) otherProfit , ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2)) /100000000,2) operateCost , ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(p.belong_profit,0)) /100000000,2) belongProfit , ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(p.final_profit,0)) /100000000,2) finalProfit, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2)) /100000000 ,2) operateProfit , ROUND( ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(p.publish_day,6,2),'/','') = '3' THEN ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) ELSE 0 END)/100000000,2) ,2) AS firstProfitRate, ROUND( ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(p.publish_day,6,2),'/','') = '6' THEN ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) ELSE 0 END)/100000000,2) ,2) AS secondProfitRate, ROUND( ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(p.publish_day,6,2),'/','') = '9' THEN ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) ELSE 0 END)/100000000,2) ,2) AS threeProfitRate, ROUND( ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(p.publish_day,6,2),'/','') = '12' THEN ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) ELSE 0 END)/100000000,2) ,2) AS forthtProfitRate,
ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2)) / SUM( ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) + ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit) ) * 100,2) operateProfitRate, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(p.belong_profit,0)) / SUM( ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) + ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit) ) * 100,2) belongProfitRate, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(p.final_profit,0)) / SUM( ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) + ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit) ) * 100,2) finalProfitRate
FROM stock_company_profit p WHERE p.stock_code = #{stockCode} AND IFNULL(p.`total_income`,0) > 0 AND IFNULL(p.`business_income`,0) > 0 AND IFNULL(p.`total_cost`,0) > 0 AND IFNULL(p.`business_cost`,0) > 0 GROUP BY LEFT(p.publish_day,4) ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT LEFT(p.publish_day,4) publishYear , ROUND( SUM( ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) + ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) + ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit) ) / 100000000,2) totalProfit, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`business_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2))/100000000,2) mainBusinessProfit, ROUND((SUM(ROUND(p.business_total_profit,2)) - (SUM(ROUND(p.`total_income`,2) - ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2)))) / 100000000,2) viceBusinessProfit, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.total_profit,2) - ROUND(p.business_total_profit)) /100000000,2) otherProfit , ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2)) /100000000,2) operateCost , ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(p.belong_profit,0)) /100000000,2) belongProfit , ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(p.final_profit,0)) /100000000,2) finalProfit, ROUND(SUM(ROUND(p.`total_cost`,2) - ROUND(p.`business_cost`,2)) /100000000 ,2) operateProfit FROM stock_company_profit p WHERE p.stock_code = #{stockCode} AND IFNULL(p.`total_income`,0) > 0 AND IFNULL(p.`business_income`,0) > 0 AND IFNULL(p.`total_cost`,0) > 0 AND IFNULL(p.`business_cost`,0) > 0 GROUP BY LEFT(p.publish_day,4) )b ON a.publishYear = (b.publishYear + 1) ORDER BY a.publishYear

SELECT stock_code stockCode, DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y') publishYear, SUM(CONVERT(total_profit,DECIMAL(20,2))) totalProfit FROM stock_company_profit WHERE stock_code = #{stockCode} AND DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y') BETWEEN #{startYear} AND #{endYear} GROUP BY stock_code,DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y')

SELECT a.stock_code stockCode, MAX(a.totalProfit) maxProfit , MIN(a.totalProfit) minProfit FROM( SELECT stock_code , DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y') publishYear, SUM(CONVERT(total_profit,DECIMAL(20,2))) totalProfit FROM stock_company_profit WHERE stock_code = #{stockCode} AND DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y') BETWEEN #{startYear} AND #{endYear} GROUP BY stock_code,DATE_FORMAT(publish_day ,'%Y') ) a
